item.title: Emails Paused
item.description:
Got it, I’ll not send you anything for the next 30 days.

See you in a month!

item.title: Got it
item.description:
You won’t get any emails from me for the next 30 days.

Looking forward to seeing you again after that!

item.title: I got your No vote!
item.description:
Thanks for responding!

Sorry this page doesn’t look fancier, my email service doesn’t support this kind of voting and I had to hack together this minimal alternative quickly

item.title: I got your Yes vote!

Thanks for responding!

Sorry this page doesn’t look fancier, my email service doesn’t support this kind of voting and I had to hack together this minimal alternative quickly
